X1 = np.random.random((100, 1))
X2 = np.random.random((100, 1))
with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
    d1 = lgb.Dataset(X1)
    d2 = lgb.Dataset(X2)
    d1.add_features_from(d2)
with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
    d1 = lgb.Dataset(X1).construct()
    d2 = lgb.Dataset(X2)
    d1.add_features_from(d2)
with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
    d1 = lgb.Dataset(X1)
    d2 = lgb.Dataset(X2).construct()
    d1.add_features_from(d2)
